home.missedReleaseDesc: Don't worry! Canceled tickets are often released at the top of every hour (e.g., 9:00, 10:00). Check the official calendar frequently for last-minute availability!

about.title: About
about.rulesContent: Tickets are released on the 2nd Wednesday of every month at 14:00 JST (Japan Standard Time, UTC+9). Tickets are sold for visits 2 months later (e.g., in February, tickets for April are sold).
about.guideContent: Check the 'Next Ticket Release' card on the home page to see the upcoming opportunity. Use the calculator below to plan ahead for a specific trip.
about.disclaimerContent: This tool is fan-made and not affiliated with Nintendo. Ticket release times are based on historical patterns. We are not responsible for any errors or missed tickets.
